website_summaries.verdict: Large cover offers the perfect balance of protection and comfort.
pros: Large cover stays on most chairs without the use of elastic straps
Protective polyester fabric keeps your furniture safe from claw marks, while the thick padding adds a level of comfort
cons: Cover is only available in 2 colors and may not fit all décor

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: This cover performs exactly as described. It is large enough to cover my large wicker chair and tuck in over the top cushion and overlap the large, curved arms. It is well made with a nice microsuede fabric which my cat loves. Or I can tuck the side flaps under the chair cushion to let the wicker arms show. And it is thick enough to protect the chair fabric. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: GardenAddict

customer_reviews.title: Save your moola
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate this below one star, I would. The covers look nice, but they don't stay on the furniture worth a hoot. First time you put them down, they're nice. The minute your dog gets up on the cover, forget it. If I straighten these out one time a day, I can do it a dozen. What's the use of having covers that you have to fix on an hourly basis. Thanks, but I'm going to look for something else that stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Chesapeakelady

customer_reviews.title: You want to buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is awesome. It's well made, and the microfiber fabric (I think that's what it is) is very soft to the touch. I enjoy sitting on my couch more now, than before the cover, even if I had no dogs. It doesn't fit my couch perfectly, but once you sit on it a while, it takes the shape well. I feel like I am sitting on a soft magical blanket all the time, and we are soaring into a world where all my furniture isn't covered with an old sheet. Very VERY nice. I love it. Someone said this thing sheds. It does not shed. I don't know that tha person was talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Robison

customer_reviews.title: Saved my couches
customer_reviews.text: These covers are saving my furniture. They are very sturdy fabric and stand up to the demands of 4 animals. My cats delight in throwing up on these covers at least 2x a week, which means I wash them at least 2x a week. They are regularly covered in fur and my large dog jumps on one to look out the window. It prevents stains and spills, nail damage and other pet problems. They do look somewhat faded after this many washes but the original color was nice and dark. I'm pleased with how they've stood up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before purchasing this product and it paid off. The fabric cleans beautifully, the dogs love it, the back is long enough over the sofa back that it doesn't flop down, it is actually pretty (or prettier than all the throws I used to use. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was the arm covers are what is too short. They could be a good 24" to 36" longer. But, too short arms are not as bad as a too short back. I washed the throw before using it and have not experienced any fabric/color rub off. Oh, did I mention, the price is the best!
customer_reviews.author: A. Mariel

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: It probably only fits the couch they show it on, but you will be lucky if it fits your couch. Plus, if it showed a video instead, it would show that the arms and the back come down once a dog jumps on the couch. Never stays in place! I got so tired of tucking and retucking and finally tucked the back and arms underneath. After a while, even those started coming out and flopping around. You might as well just use an old blanket. Right now it's tucked away in a storage bin. Don't waste you money.
customer_reviews.author: LaineyBell

customer_reviews.title: It's working great!
customer_reviews.text: We have lovely new furniture, but the cat's love to sleep on the backs of sofas and seats of chairs. To protect furniture from pet hair, we have used slipcovers in the past which were hard to put on and always came out of the dryer wrinkled and looking dumpy. When I saw this product at a friend's home, I knew it would be a much better solution. They go on very easy, and when we have company we can quickly scoop them up, and guests have chairs to use that are free of pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: LHeine

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: From Richard's wife: This chair cover is just what I was hoping to find!!! I give it a "thumbs-up" in virtually every category -- quality, durability, appearance, "stay-puttedness," and price. . . and the dog likes it, too!!! The back is long enough to go over the top of a reasonably tall recliner, the seat section is more than adequate, and I especially like the attached arm covers -- wide and long enough to cover the chair arms and STAY PUT!
customer_reviews.author: RPL

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Yes everyone is right that you have to keep straighting it especially on our leather couch. But it is worth it to keep the cat hair and claws out of the couch. Compared to the other kinds I have seen this one beats them all. They are comfortable to sit on and attractive to look at. No matter how often I have to rearrange it I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Anitta York

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sofa covers
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sofa covers. We have had one for three years now and it still holds up after many washings. Just ordered two more for two new sofas. Quilted and thick. Protects our leather from the dog. No traction to it, so it slides around and off sofa easily, but we just keep shoving it back on. Dimensions correct.
customer_reviews.author: Joaner10

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and works great !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the sofa and loveseat cover for my new furniture. I have 4 dogs, a cat, a messy teenager and grandkids and wanted to protect my furniture. I was excited about these covers and they meet all my expectations and more ! They work great and fit perfect. They are very soft and well padded, comfy to sit on, and look great, they match the color of my furniture. Great investment ! I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: supermomw3

customer_reviews.title: When it arrived it seemed like it would work
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs and a cat. Needless to say, they produce a lot of fur and bring dirt into the house. We bought this hoping it would protect our sofa and decrease the amount of fur getting in the cracks which is difficult to get out. When it arrived it seemed like it would work, and it did for awhile. The problem is that it doesn't really stay in place and constantly is falling off the back. It seems to always end up in a ball. We have a leather sofa and it may work better on a surface that isn't so slick to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Ananda

customer_reviews.title: This looks much better on my sofa than a sheet does
customer_reviews.text: This looks much better on my sofa than a sheet does. But that's where the advantage stops. The dog hair sticks to it - and everytime my dog gets on the sofa, the entire front lifts up - so the sofa is exposed anyhow. i guess I should have gotten a cover that drapes over the front instead of just covering the cushions
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: It is okay.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few months and the best thing I can say is it is okay. The plus side is it is thinker than most couch covers so my dogs nails don't get to the couch. It also keeps the hair off the couch where the dog sits. Bad thing about this is it doesn't stay on the couch if a person sits on it. I don't think I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works well on couch, though you have to reposition ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well on couch, though you have to reposition it often. I've been using it with one dog who sits on the couch a lot and have washed it several times. It isn't going to last as long as expected; where the dog lays is already looking worn and the fabric has small balls of material in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for animals
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for your couch loving pet. I have had this for several years and it's been washed over 100 times. It still has the look and feel of when I first got it. You can tell the side that my dog lays on though. It has protected my couch 100% though from stains and hair. Love it and a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Schirf

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but slides off of my furniture
customer_reviews.text: These are very attractive well made pet covers. They look fantastic when you first put them on. Unfortunately however, after you sit on them a few times they slide right off of your sofa. You constantly have to rearrange, pull and tuck. The price was very reasonable, but was not expecting this and am somewhat disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Soft But Very Synthetic
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other covers this one isn't good for couches. It's best for a recliner. After 7 years it's now shedding weird plasticky material. Our other couch covers from Duluth Trading still work and were better all around for both the car and couches.
customer_reviews.author: cammieh

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover to protect the couch.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up easily and dries very fast. Keeps the couch protected. Does move around a bit, but I don't have a problem tucking it in again after the dog(s) and I have used it for several hours. My friends have an Orvis cover that is nicer but they also paid 5 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Furniture cover for pet lover's
customer_reviews.text: You do not realize what gets on to your couch Until you see what appears on the covers, They do slide and you have to keep putting them back to their original place:) They do well in laundry and I do that once weekly. It's better than the dog's laying on the leather")
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love the fabric & durability of this cover!
customer_reviews.text: This sofa cover has been washed many times & still looks great, we allow our dogs on the couch so wanted a sturdy nice looking cover. We wash it at least once a week- still looks great after almost a year. My only complaint is that they don't make a cover for reclining sofas that have splits for the recliner back & leg area.
customer_reviews.author: rural buyer

customer_reviews.title: Ruby Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Our newest rescue loves to take a running leap onto a chair we have in our bedroom so, since I couldn't break her of the habit (not that I tried very hard), I decided to order this cover. I probably should have ordered pins to secure it because it does come loose when she "spazzes" on it but I really like it. It launders well, too.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and stays put
customer_reviews.text: This cover looks so much nicer than a blanket or a sheet covering the couch. It is a good thickness, is designed to stay in place. It still moves a bit as people and animals sit on it, but it is easy to straighten out. I have not washed it yet but it seems like it will wash well. It looks just as it does in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: cindib

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve bought and I love it. It fits so well and is comfy even for humans to sit or lay on but perfect for my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Rock 13

customer_reviews.title: Pet Cover nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The pet cover feels good to sit on, keeps my dog's dander and fur off furniture. It is slippery on leather as others have mentioned and I do need to "anchor" it with a wall.behind. Even so, I like it. My suggestion would be to have the company find an easy way to keep it from sliding on leather.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scherting

customer_reviews.title: happy even though we have leather loveseat
customer_reviews.text: generous cut that allows it to cover our loveseat, but not be too bulky...we put it on our leather loveseat and it does slip a bit...but generous enough cut that it still protects and it is easy to straighten back into place...haven't washed it yet, so can't comment on that...
customer_reviews.author: samsbarb

customer_reviews.title: Ours is about 4 years old and has held up ...
customer_reviews.text: Ours is about 4 years old and has held up very well, material is all intact-- and we have a large dog (90lbs of muscle) who loves to "rearrange" it to his liking. Washes well too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good non-slip quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality attractive chair covers. They have good friction and can be used on either side. I am very pleased with them, and am considering buying the sofa cover
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: K & H Furniture Pet Cover
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It stays in place fairly well. It is good quality and does the job very effectively. Adults can sit on it without it moving. My dog like to scratch to find her comfortable spot and I dont have to constantly straighten the cover. When I do its just a quick tuck here and there. I feel its worth the extra money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a leather couch and there is no mechanism ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a leather couch and there is no mechanism to hold this in place when the pet goes flying on and off the couch. I tried tucking the ends under but it wont stay. For it to get more stars from me it needs some sort of elastic holder system. The fabric is thick
customer_reviews.author: Its Me 1

customer_reviews.title: does the job.
customer_reviews.text: the color goes well with the sofa and room. it is easy to wash and return to the sofa, reduces my work related to vaccuming of the sofa of dog hair. it fits well, but more sliding than i thought it might have, but it really isnt bad when you think about how easy it is to keep clean .
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous, but decided to give this item a try. We have a pug who loves to rub her face in into our fabric couch. This item fit our standard 3 seat couch very well and is holding up extremely well. It does need to be adjusted every so often but so would any cover. It is think enough to keep her from damaging if she digs at it. I have great coverage and it came at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kippie

customer_reviews.title: I have seen some of these covers that have straps ...
customer_reviews.text: I have seen some of these covers that have straps to hold them to the piece of furniture..........I may order one of those next.The only problem with this slip cover is that it seems to move around and everytime I sit down I have to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Smith

customer_reviews.title: purchased twice
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product twice. I used the first one for about 3 years and bought the next one when I moved. Pros: It seems my dog feels comfortable on it. It covers most part of couch. Durable. Cons: It is washable but I think it depends on dog breed. My dog shed a lot and her hair is strong and of mid-length. I cannot remove it from the cover by washing it. I have to remove hair with a roller or dog comb before washing.
customer_reviews.author: Dong-In Sin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Washes and dries great. Bought mine thru Amazon Warehouse for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nan K

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice couch cover. I purchased it for a couch that I also bought through Amazon. The couch isn't great, but this cover is perfect for my basset hound who tends to have sloth claws for nails.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Our German Shepherd developed the habit of sneaking on to our cream couch when we weren't around, so I was looking for something I could toss in the wash. This cover fits our couch very well. It's soft and cosy and I like the colour. I haven't had it long so can't say how well it'll hold up to washing and drying but so far I'm happy with my purchase and think it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Davies

customer_reviews.title: protects the chair
customer_reviews.text: this item does what it advertises to do = protect furniture. We have 2 dogs and they jump up on the furniture and one of them wants to bundle the cover up and them lay down. That defeats the purpose but we are trying to correct the dog not to do that. Otherwise it has been satisfactory,
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lane

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, I decided to give it a chance. But it shifted out of place every time I sat on it. I gave up using it. What a waste if time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Arney

customer_reviews.title: K&H Pet Couch Cover
customer_reviews.text: I meant to order the tan but got the mocha. I decided to keep it. It works quite well. One arm keeps sliding off. I need to figure out how to keep it on. I have washed it once and it looks great. Our basset/beagle mix is a real shedder. This keeps the hair off the couch and looks nice at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: aeb

customer_reviews.title: and comfortable material, looks like it will last years and ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, made well, and comfortable material, looks like it will last years and not show its age. The price was cheaper than I expected for the quality I received, thank you too for timely delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cover!
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits over my large couch perfectly! The only problem is that I have 5 dogs and they can mess it up if they decide to play. That is no fault of the cover! LOL!!!! Great price for such a great product. Color is perfect. I got a deal!
customer_reviews.author: TeriTops

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: protects the couch, but the sides tend to slide down, and it bunches up. washes easily though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for several years now and I don't like the way the dog hair clings to it. I've tried to use a lint roller on it and it doesn't work. Don't like the fabric. Had to take it apart and resew it cause it didn't fit the chair properly.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Bone

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the sofa size dark brown. It fits my oversized loveseat very well and stays on better than the blankets and old quilts I had been using. The dog hairs stick to it, and I do find it a bit over priced, but my dog likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: a bit expensive, but works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with my K&H couch cover thus far. The mocha color is a very dark brown (not a lighter brown as it appears in the photo), which matched my couch perfectly. This cover is also larger than the cheaper model by TexStyle, so it fit my couch (which is slightly longer than most) perfectly. The suede cover looks stylish, and is also nice and soft for the dogs. Is of a good size to fit in the washing machine as well. So wonderful that I no longer have to use the double-blanket tactic on my couch!
customer_reviews.author: Lisanne

customer_reviews.title: Buy 2 of these
customer_reviews.text: ...always have one on the couch and one in the washer/dryer. They are not unattractive or uncomfortable to sit on yourself. I accidentally dried one of these on a high setting once. It did not like it. Don't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. I bought new recliners and a week or so later, much to my dismay, my son brought home a dog! This covering washes great. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it does tend to slip (so I bought some velcro strips and attached it to the back of the chair and under the arms - works great). I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Donna W. Michaud

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time keeping it on the sofa. Even with a small dog, it slides off every time he get up on the sofa. I bought one for my condo, but I will not buy one for the other three condos.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Overton

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and well fitting cover
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and well fitting cover. Only gripe is securing it so it doesn't constantly slide down when someone sits on it. Has definitely saved the couch from the dog.
customer_reviews.author: azim300

customer_reviews.title: washes easily and easy to place
customer_reviews.text: This has worked well, washes easily and easy to place. It does have to be rearranged all the time
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Just Barely OK
customer_reviews.text: Purchased due to reviews. This cover was to small for my couch and doesn't cover the arms. By sliding to one side, one arm is covered leaving the other arm uncovered. Medium thickness but a little flimsy. Back wants to slide down occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Man

customer_reviews.title: Great at keeping pet hair off furniture, but cover constantly slips off of furniture...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit bummed out about this cover- I spent a lot of money on two of them and they just slip off constantly. It became a blanket for my dog now. Back to ruined furniture until I can find a better alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Smushyhippo

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it! It does slide on a leather couch ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it! It does slide on a leather couch but we don't mind just get used to straightening it out 5 times a day. Anything for the critters.
customer_reviews.author: Giff

customer_reviews.title: Slides around on leather
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice thick couch cover that could be enhanced by some kind of adjustable strap that would keep it from sliding off of my leather couch. The dogs get it bunched up in no time flat.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Welch

customer_reviews.title: K&H Pet Cover from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very well made and sturdy, and looks plush. My dogs immediately checked it out. It collects some pet hair, but I vacuum it off once a week and that keeps it under control. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SylNM

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For Owners with Pets that Shed!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, looks great and washes up easily! A must have for anyone with animals that shed. This will definitely help keep your furniture last longer.
customer_reviews.author: peggybeth

customer_reviews.title: No More Arguments!  LOL!
customer_reviews.text: Convincing my husband to change before plopping on the couch was useless. Now that the couch is protected, no more arguements!! Plus our dog's contribution of dog hair is no longer an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia J

customer_reviews.title: Pet Couch Cover a great asset!
customer_reviews.text: I received a pet cove3r for Christmas, but it was a little small for my couch. This cover fits perfectly and I love the color. I would purchase again if I need another one. I have not laundered this product yet, however the material appears to be one that will wash up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: I like the way this cover works
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this cover works, but wish the choice of colors was better - and felt misled when I saw that it was made in China!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Quincy

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: quality materials, looks nice. great deal for the price, and stopped my cat from scratching up my leather chair. it does slide around a little, but it is leather after all. might want to sew in some weights or grip pads.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Oleary

customer_reviews.title: works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to keep hair and nail scratches off my leather chairs. Would be nice if there were straps or some other way to have it stay in place better but that is a minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pet cover!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect cover! It has a nice feel and fits well on my sofa. My dog is quite comfortable on the cover. It is well made and washes/dries well,too.
customer_reviews.author: lucyjackandme

customer_reviews.title: Great For RV's
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use in the RV so we don't get dog hair all over the sofa. It is really nice, doesn't slip around, comfortable and not cheesy looking. I also bought one for the chair.
customer_reviews.author: S. Farr

customer_reviews.title: Pet Cover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from Amazon with Prime. Great value and feels nice to sit on. I bought the dark brown color and it is easy to remove cat hair with a lint roller. The roller even picks up bits of litter that sometimes show up.
customer_reviews.author: Snicker

customer_reviews.title: it works but doesn't fit my recliner as good as i wished
customer_reviews.text: it works but doesn't fit my recliner as good as i wished. Too narrow on the "back" side and too long over the arm rest.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Jaques-Dalcroze

customer_reviews.title: not well thought out
customer_reviews.text: Fits the couch but will not stay on. It needs some kind of grippers. When it stays on it works Shortly after its on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID SHAPIRO

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is wearing well. Like the thickness since I have an 80 lb. lab. I have a rather long sofa and would like to have had a choice of sizes but it is doing ok.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy N

customer_reviews.title: Best Reliner Protector
customer_reviews.text: This is this best recliner protector I have found. It is the only one that fits my Lazy Boy! I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Loveseat pet cover
customer_reviews.text: The back and arm sections don't stay in place very well, but that has more to do with the style of my furniture. Using mainly to cover the seats and it does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R Atterberry

customer_reviews.title: This works great for my docs and he loves it and so ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my docs and he loves it and so do we
customer_reviews.author: Big G

customer_reviews.title: just what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Fits great does exactly what I wanted keeps th edogs off the furniture surface.....fits well and looks great...wish there were more color choices
customer_reviews.author: gary blakely

customer_reviews.title: No Pet Hair on my couch
customer_reviews.text: Its OK, does not really stay put with Leather couches. I was disappointed in how slippery it was and does not stay on the couch, i may return it.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Was larger than anticipated though. I had to fold it, but it works to cover the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiola C

customer_reviews.title: Furniture Saver
customer_reviews.text: Fit Perfectly - Great Price!! Highly recommend this to anyone with dog hair issues. Quick delivery, very satisfied! Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty#1

customer_reviews.title: My dog knows when I put the covering on my ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog knows when I put the covering on my chair, she is welcome. This product is attractive and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: This saves my couch !
customer_reviews.text: It fit great !I have a sectional sofa and I still could make this work.It washes and dries perfectly. My dogs run on the couch and it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: carol j sheppard

customer_reviews.title: It meets my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: it does what I want it to and that is to keep the smell and dirt from my pets off the couches. For me the color matches perfectly with my couch. It does slip down but nothing that a little straightening doesn't fix every once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa N.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: The long top keeps the cover in place. It washes well and is sturdy fabric. So far it is stronger than two dogs and a grandson! I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Item was returned because it didn't not fit properly with our sofa. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. Comer

customer_reviews.title: Fits like it's custom!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is super nice quality and it fits onto our standard size sofa like it was made for it! It's a very good quality material too! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Waltrips

customer_reviews.title: Works very well at protecting from the dog getting my couch dirty!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as shown. Works very well at protecting from the dog getting my couch dirty!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love, washes wonderful n hung to dry in just few minutes. cant say enough good words
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Protects.
customer_reviews.text: Fits. Stays on longer than the blanket we used before. Protects leather from pet claws. Color blends well with chair and room.
customer_reviews.author: VTTerri

customer_reviews.title: Love seat cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover fits well. Use it in my motor home and have been very satisified
customer_reviews.author: lspence

customer_reviews.title: Keeping your couch dog proofed!
customer_reviews.text: We have a large plush coated dog so fur is easily left on the furniture. The couch is one of the places she is allowed to have as her place, this protects the furniture really well.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: was a good buy
customer_reviews.text: i bought this cover about a month ago. i like it alot but it could be a little bigger. the back of my couch is big and bulky and it has to be pulled up alot. but nonetheless i would recommed it.the dogs and cats seem to enjoy laying on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. We bought it for our love seat and it covers well. Comfortable. Stays put when our two year old grandson climbs on it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Haas

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but does not stay put
customer_reviews.text: Good material, very soft but does not stay on furniture after having been sat on.
customer_reviews.author: Anon35

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my couch. Keeps furniture clean and dog hair off it.
customer_reviews.author: RJV

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works as expected and looks better than putting a blanket over the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Covers are great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for several months now. I have over-sized recliners, and they fit for the most part. The back will tend to come down after getting in and out of the chair frequently. They are machine washable, dry quickly, and still looks fresh and new afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scott

customer_reviews.title: does it's duty
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs and a toddler and this cover works great. fits just right on my sofa and is very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 dogs and these are a tremendous help in keeping the furniture clean.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Best cover for pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is easy to clean and very useful for pets.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Vanhoose

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works like a charm. keeps my dog from drooling on my chair.
customer_reviews.author: metro north user

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Washes up great and doesn't seem to move too much as other covers I've had did. The cats love sleeping on them too.
customer_reviews.author: Catstrek

customer_reviews.title: great cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: I order a whole set (chair, loveseat, and sofa) in mocha color. They look great and the price is not bad either. The fit is good and they stay in place. I have two boys and a dog and the covers do the job of protecting my furniture and they stay in place. To help you guys out I have a microfiber furniture. I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: doesnt stay on
customer_reviews.text: i had to sew several straps to the back to get it to stay on, if you’re not prepared to do that don’t buy this or plan on using it as a rug.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M Stacy

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was shoddy, it was impossible to keep in place. Everytime our dog got onto the loveseat the fabic would shift, it did not stay on the arms of the couch. Overall I was very disappointed with the quality of the cover I had expected a cover with more weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: K&H Pet Products Furniture Cover - Protects your furniture from pet hair
product_meta.description: Size:Chair| Color:Tan| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingProtect your furniture with these beautifully baffled microsuede covers. Available in 2 neutral colors and 3 sizes that fit a chair, loveseat or sofa. Microsuede will capture loose hair and protect furniture from dirt. Fabric is made from 100% polyester so it can be easily machine washed. Pets will love to sleep on this cozy cover.
feature_bullets: Fits chair: 22 x 26 seat; 42 x 47 back; 22 x 26 side arms
Captures loose hair to protect your furniture
Available in 2 colors and 3 sizes that fit a chair, loveseat or sofa
